output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240015 is present, indicating this is electoral material.
2. Refers to candidates: - Marcel Ciolacu (PSD presidential candidate) - Nicolae Ciucă (PNL presidential candidate) Are directly mentioned and criticized.
3. Addresses wide population: - Yes, this is a paid advertisement with significant reach (125,000-150,000 impressions) - Uses inclusive language ("noi", "românilor") - Calls for action ("vino la vot")
4. Electoral objective: - For parliamentary elections: Promotes USR as the only alternative - For presidential: Criticizes both Ciolacu and Ciucă - Makes direct references to after-election scenarios
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is clearly campaign material, not journalism - Contains political promises and warnings - Has a clear partisan position
6. Personal opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but an official party communication (USR) - Contains campaign messaging and electoral strategy

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Has official CMF number - Makes direct references to presidential candidates in a negative context - Is a paid advertisement with wide reach - Has clear electoral objectives for both parliamentary and presidential elections - Contains specific political messaging and calls to action
conclusion.message-for-police: Uniunea Salvați România - USR, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unui material de propagandă electorală (ID postare Facebook: 1612369773046758) după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală pentru alegerile prezidențiale. Materialul face referiri directe și negative la candidații prezidențiali Marcel Ciolacu și Nicolae Ciucă, încercând să influențeze opinia publică împotriva acestora după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea este sponsorizată, are un grad mare de expunere (peste 125.000 de impresii) și conține elementele specifice materialelor de propagandă electorală, inclusiv număr CMF (11240015).
